task.summary: Default task
Initial commit
Swap between editable/non-editable list item view
Clear all checked items when list is re-ordered
Various changes to CustomAdapter Added new list row layout for subset marker item
Added confirmation dialog fragment class, with callback to parent class
Exclude the source setlist from the list of target setlists when copying songs
Cleaned up code inspection warnings
Added song duration column to DB Changed behaviour of tap vs tap&hold on list item. Tap now displays summary dialog
Various further developments
Moved classes into setlistmanagement package Check for network availablity, and limit search to local only if not
Implement help system using ShowcaseView
Added gig and venue management code
Various further developments
Added additional jar to support sending of email Various minor layout changes
Changed implementation of sliding tab layout in line with API 21. Removed use of deprecated interfaces.
Added database backup code, and XML parser (XOM)
Removed two dependency between gig and venue tables. Venue table now has last gig date, rather than foreign key reference into the gig table
Added landscape screen layouts
Renamed application
Changed package name
Added code to restore database
Removed calls to deprecated APIs for shared preferences Added PrefsFragment
Update all gigs in the database, when date format preference is changed Fixed some minor issues when gig/venue list is changed
Store gig/venue dates in the DB as integer, so that ordering can be done. Use the date format user preference to format the date for display purposes
Test task
Check for setlist in use by gig(s) before trying to delete it
Hide soft keyboard on application startup
Minor layout issues
Bug fixes Change title of setlist/song tab, depending on mode
Various bug fixes
Various bug fixes
Cancelling copy while in songlist causes setlists to be displayed
Changed wording on help page

MESSAGE.value: Cleaned up code inspection warnings
Added song duration column to DB Changed behaviour of tap vs tap&hold on list item. Tap now displays summary dialog
Various further developments
Moved classes into setlistmanagement package Check for network availablity, and limit search to local only if not
Implement help system using ShowcaseView

Various further developments
Added additional jar to support sending of email Various minor layout changes
Changed implementation of sliding tab layout in line with API 21. Removed use of deprecated interfaces.
Added database backup code, and XML parser (XOM)
Removed two dependency between gig and venue tables. Venue table now has last gig date, rather than foreign key reference into the gig table

Update all gigs in the database, when date format preference is changed Fixed some minor issues when gig/venue list is changed

Various bug fixes

Changed wording on help page
